channel.title: tool-development on Lasseigne Lab
channel.description: Recent content in tool-development on Lasseigne Lab

item.title: Computational Tools
item.description: Building on the lab’s interest in sharing tools with the research community, we are developing project-relevant R packages and Shiny applications including test data and instructional vignettes to facilitate exploration, visualization, and analysis of multidimensional data sets. Such tools will accelerate future discoveries by allowing more rapid analysis of the relationships among genomic data sets and with disease, as well as increase research reproducibility in data-driven approaches to complex disease research.
